query:
UPDATE island_guides SET 
  flightInfo = 'Domestic flights from Malé International Airport to Alif Alif Atoll take approximately 20-25 minutes. Several airlines operate this route with multiple daily flights. The flight offers scenic views of the atolls and is a convenient option for those wanting to minimize travel time.',
  speedboatInfo = 'Speedboat transfers from Malé International Airport to Thoddoo take approximately 45-60 minutes depending on sea conditions. This is the most common transfer method for tourists. Most resorts and guesthouses arrange speedboat pickups. The journey provides beautiful views of the turquoise lagoons.',
  ferryInfo = 'Local ferries operate between nearby islands in Alif Alif Atoll, making island hopping convenient. Ferry schedules vary seasonally, so it is recommended to check with your accommodation or local tour operators for current schedules and routes.'
WHERE slug = 'thoddoo'
command:

  flightInfo = 'Domestic flights from Malé International Airport to Alif Alif Atoll take approximately 20-25 minutes. Several airlines operate this route with multiple daily flights. The flight offers scenic views of the atolls and is a convenient option for those wanting to minimize travel time.',
  speedboatInfo = 'Speedboat transfers from Malé International Airport to Thoddoo take approximately 45-60 minutes depending on sea conditions. This is the most common transfer method for tourists. Most resorts and guesthouses arrange speedboat pickups. The journey provides beautiful views of the turquoise lagoons.',
  ferryInfo = 'Local ferries operate between nearby islands in Alif Alif Atoll, making island hopping convenient. Ferry schedules vary seasonally, so it is recommended to check with your accommodation or local tour operators for current schedules and routes.'
WHERE slug = 'thoddoo'
